params.proof: The merkle proof verification for the return.
The merkle proof verification for claiming.

params.salt: The salt used in the encryption process

params.token: The address of the token to be withdrawn.

params.sealedBidAuctionAddressConfig: The address configuration for the the sealed bid auction.
params.sealedBidAuctionPeriodAndFeeConfig: The period and fee configuration for the sealed bid auction.

params.merkleRoot: The merkle root to verify against.

params.capitalRaised: The total capital raised from the auction
params.merkleRoot: The merkle root to verify against.
params.sealedBidPrivateKey: the private key used to decrypt sealed bids
params.tokensAllocated: The total amount of tokens allocated for distribution among investors.

supplyTokens(uint256,uint256).details: Can be called only by the Project admin address.

params.amount: The token amount supplied by the project.
params.legionFee: The token amount supplied by the project.

withdrawCapital().details: Can be called only by the Project admin address.

cancelExpiredSale().notice: Cancels a sale in case the project has not supplied tokens after the lockup period is over.

claimExcessCapital(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Claim excess capital back to the investor.

decryptSealedBid(uint256,uint256).notice: Decrypts the sealed bid, once the private key has been published by Legion.

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.notice: Withdraw tokens from the contract in case of emergency.

initialize((uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Initialized the contract with correct parameters.

initializePublishSaleResults().notice: Initializes the process of publishing of sale results, by locking sale cancelation.

pledgeCapital(uint256,bytes,bytes).notice: Pledge capital to the sealed bid auction.

publishExcessCapitalResults(bytes32).notice: Publish merkle root for distribution of excess capital, once the sale has concluded.

publishSaleResults(bytes32,uint256,uint2.notice: Publish merkle root for distribution of tokens, once the sale has concluded.

releaseTokens().notice: Releases tokens to the investor address.

requestRefund().notice: Request a refund from the sale during the applicable time window.

saleAddressConfiguration().notice: Returns the address configuration for the sealed bid auction.

salePeriodAndFeeConfiguration().notice: Returns the period and fee configuration for the sealed bid auction.

saleStatus().notice: Returns the status for the sealed bid auction.

supplyTokens(uint256,uint256).notice: Supply tokens once the sale results have been published.

withdrawCapital().notice: Withdraw capital from the sale contract.
